english_example_sentence: If you had shown more effort, you would have reached that challenging goal.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты приложил больше усилий, ты бы достиг той сложной цели.
turkish_example_sentence: Daha fazla çaba gösterseydin, o zorlu hedefe ulaşırdın.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Daha fazla çaba gösterseydin, o zorlu hedefe ______.
